title: 100%swag
author: 100%swag
content: You can now mine Bitcoin on the Ethereum Network!PulseBitcoin is a innovative new way to mine Bitcoin on the Ethereum Network.Steps To Mine:1.Go to PulseBitcoin.com and understand what PulseBitcoin is2.Acquire ASIC Coins — Application Specific Internet Coins. Via a Decentralized Exchange Such as: Uniswap3.Go to PulseBitcoin.app and add how many ASIC you want to mine PulseBitcoin.4.“Approve amount” transaction in your wallet5.Approve the “Start Miner” Transaction6.End miner after 30 days to receive your PulseBitcoin and ASIC

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: So what is this exactly? Some form of decentralized mining contracts like we had back in 2015? I remember many got suckered into those lifetime 1th/s mining contracts only later to learn that when the maintainance cost is greater than the profit the contract is void.This sounds awfully similar.  I didn’t click the links because don’t want malware and don’t plan on buying these asic tokens.

comments.author: Nhazwrath
comments.body: so....  its a gambling site? which you have to buy the casinos token.   which only pays out in the casinos token..   can the token be redeemed for cash or bitcoin?have i got that right?  please enlighten.
